overview: VP Operations and Finance Most recently, served as Director of Financial Operations for MDSynergy, a privately held company in the health services industry. Prior to that was part of the executive team that lead the growth and ultimately, the sale of Specialty Surgical Centers to Symbion, Inc.(NDAQ: SMBI) for more than $70 million. Prior to obtaining his MBA from the Anderson School of Business at UCLA, Singh worked for PriceWaterhouseCoopers, Ernst & Young and Hewlett Packard.

degrees.institution: Anderson School of Business at UCLA
